attributes.action: Deal with the Problem of our Overcrowded roads by keeping the bad drivers off not the Poor ones
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Roads of England get more congested every year and will continue to until eventually it will not be worth driving into Cities at all. Tony Blair is awhere of this problem but we ask you instead of taxing the poor off the road make driving licenses expire every 5 years to be retaken within 6 months of the end. This will serve 2 purposes by making our roads safer and less congested.
